SEARCH
Package control

Class SuggestionController

Object
SuggestionController
public class SuggestionController extends Object
Static control class for interfacing with all UI classes and handling requests regardingSuggestion

These include:
1) Creation, edit and deletion of Suggestion
2) Returning ArrayList of suggestions
3) Approving or rejecting Suggestion by Staff
